actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To transfer a parcel of land in Hyde Park, New York.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to transfer, without consideration, to two named individuals all U.s. right, title, and interest in and to any portion of a certain parcel of land in Hyde Park, New York.

titles.title: To transfer a parcel of land in Hyde Park, New York.
